The loan will be used to purchase construction materials to begin remodeling the open areas of their home. This will help keep Jose healthy and give his family more peace of mind.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing construction materials

loans.name: Damiana

texts.es:
Damiana, de 48 años, hace mucho tiempo ya, sus hijos son independientes y tienen sus propias familias. Ella vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es vivir una vejez tranquila.
En las afueras de la ciudad se encuentra su horno de ladrillos. Cada mañana se levanta muy temprano para amasar y moldear los ladrillos, los cuales posteriormente hará secar por 10 días y los meterá en su horno. 
Esta actividad le ha generado los ingresos económicos necesarios para sacar adelante a sus tres hijos, es por eso que ella todavía continua realizándola.
Por otro lado, lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es vender sus ladrillos y ver que su trabajo es bien recompensado. Lleva 10 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es trabajar con el barro, ya que en las temporadas de frió el barro se torna muy helado, haciendo que se enferme y no pueda trabajar normalmente. 
Con el tiempo, desea contratar unos ayudantes para que su negocio aumente su producción y así tener mejores ingresos económicos.

Este es el tercer préstamo de Damiana con MFP, espera ser muy puntual en sus pagos, ya que no desea perjudicar a las demás socias de su banco comunal, donde es muy querida y respetada. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados comprará nuevos moldes para hacer sus ladrillos, ya que los que actualmente usa están deteriorados por el paso del tiempo.
texts.en:
Damiana is 48 years old and her children have been independent and have had their own families for a long time. She lives in her own house and what she desires the most is to live in her old age in peace. She has a brick oven located in the outskirts of the city. Each morning she gets up very early to mix and mold the bricks, those of which afterward will dry for 10 days and she will put in her oven. This activity has generated an income for her that allowed her to give the best to her three children. It’s for this reason that she is still doing it. On the other hand, what she likes the most about her job is selling her bricks and seeing that her work is well worth it. She has been doing this for 10 years and she thinks the most difficult thing about it is working with the mud, since in the cold season the mud is very frozen, causing her to get sick and not be able to work normally. This is Damiana’s third loan with MFP. She hopes to be very punctual in her payments, since she does not want to harm the other members of her community bank, where she is very well-liked and respected. With the 500 nuevos soles that she is asking for, she will buy new molds to make her bricks, since the ones she uses now are deteriorating as time passes.

Translated from Spanish by Kelley Maynard, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of molds for bricks

loans.name: Elisa

texts.es:
Elisa, de 30 años, es una madre muy cariñosa, vive en la casa de unos de sus familiares junto a sus dos pequeños niños; Ebert de 5 y Mayeli de 3 años, a quienes desea darles unos buenos estudios.
Todos los días a partir de las 6 de la mañana, junto a su carretilla de jugos, sale en busca de clientes, a los cuales vender sus deliciosos preparados. Ella vende distintos tipos de bebidas y jugos de fruta durante el día y por la mañana ofrece a sus clientes el popular “jugo caliente de quinua” (bebida hecha a base de quinua, mandioca y manzana licuada) y otro saludables emolientes para calentar a las personas, pues es una zona muy fría.
Por otro lado, lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes, lleva 5 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil para ella es tener que permanecer en la calle todo el día, soportando las inclemencias del clima. 
Para más adelante, anhela que su negocio progrese y que pronto pueda instalar una tienda donde atienda con más tranquilidad a sus clientes.

Este es el octavo préstamo de Elisa con MFP y se siente muy confiada de poder pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que no quiere causar problemas a su banco comunal,  donde es muy querida por ser la socia más joven y alegre. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará nuevas ollas, vasos, baldes, etc., para preparar sus bebidas con mayor higiene, ya que las que usa actualmente ya están muy viejitas.
texts.en:
Elisa, who is 30 years old, is a very loving mother, and lives in the home of one of her family members together with her two small children: Ebert who is 5 and Mayeli who is 3. She wishes to give them a very good education.

Every day from 6 o'clock in the morning, together with her cart full of juices, she leaves in search of customers, to whom she sells her prepared delicious drinks. She sells different kinds of drinks and fruit juices throughout the day, and in the morning, she offers her customers the popular "hot quinoa juice" (a drink made with a base of quinoa, cassava and apple juice), and other healthy emollients to warm people up, because it is a very cold region. Other the other hand, what she likes the most about her job is to talk with her customers. She has been in this business for 5 years, and considers the most difficult part for her to have to stay in the street all day, enduring the harshness of the climate. In order to get ahead, she wishes that her business progresses and that soon she can set up a shop where she can attend to her customers more peacefully.

This is Elisa's eighth loan with MFP, and she feels very confident in being able to make her payments on time, since she doesn't want to cause problems with her community bank, where she is very well-loved for being a young and happy member. With the 2,000 new soles she is requesting, she will buy new pots, glasses, and buckets, etc. in order to prepare her drinks with greater hygiene, since the ones she currently uses are already very old.

Translated from Spanish by Amy McGinty, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy utensils

loans.name: Houma

texts.fr: Houma B., 51 ans, est du Banc Villageois de GADAPARA depuis 5 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants. Elle fait de la transformation et vente de pâte d'arachide, elle vend également des graines d'arachide et des tissus. Son objectif est de participer à l'amélioration des conditions de vie de sa famille et de renforcer son niveau d'épargne.
texts.en:
Houma B., 51 years old, has been with the Banc Villageois of Gadapara for five years. She is married and the mother of two children. She makes and sells peanut-butter, she also sells groundnuts and fabric. Her goal is to contribute to the improvement of her family's quality of life and to strengthen her savings.

Translated from French by Carolyn McMahon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Strengthen her investment capital

loans.name: Gilberto Jose

texts.es: El señor Gilberto es un hombre de iniciativa y esforzado al trabajo que desde horas tempranas sale para captar cliente el cual siempre carga una portada de fondo para tomar las fotos, también en su casa las tomas y dedica días para poder recibir  a sus clientes. Es  casado y con cuatro hijos que procreo su esposa, juntos han logrado formar su propio negocio, ella tiene un kiosco en el colegio del barrio la cual comparten los gastos para poder apoyar  a que sus hijos se formen con una buena educación. Don Gilberto es fotógrafo desde hace más de doce años. Cuando inicio lo hizo con iniciativa propia ya que le gustaba tomar foto y la necesidad de poder traer dinero a su familia, el  cual fue tomando experiencia y con poco dinero comenzó. Con este financiamiento comprara materiales de construcción como: piedra, arena, cemento, hierro para ampliar un poco más la sala con el fin de tener mejor comodidad para su familia ya que es pequeña. Da las gracias a la institución por el financiamiento que gracias ah estos ha podido estar estable en su negocios de fotografia.
texts.en:
Mr. Gilberto is a man with initiative and dedicated to work; early in the morning he goes out looking for customers, always carrying a portable background to take pictures; he also takes pictures at his house, scheduling days to service his customers. He is married with 4 children procreated with his wife; together they have been able to build their own business; she has a kiosk in the neighborhood’s school and they share the expenses so they can support their children in getting a good education. Mr. Gilberto has been a photographer for more than 12 years. When he started, it was from his initiative, since he liked taking pictures, and the need to bring money to his family; he started with little money and he began gaining experience. With this loan, he will buy construction materials such as stone, sand, cement and wrought iron to expand their small living room and improve the comfort of his family. He thanks the institution for the loan since thanks to these loans he has been able to have a stable business in photography.

Translated from Spanish by Carlos Morales, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy construction materials such as stone, sand, cement and wrought iron

loans.name: Elmer

texts.es:
Elmer es un muchacho de 21 años, muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia hecha de abobe, junto a su esposa Micaela, de 19 años, y su querido hijo Ton de 1 año, a quienes desea dar un buen futuro.
Los días como ladrillero son muy largos y duros, se levanta a las 6 de la mañana para realizar el amasado y moldeado de los ladrillos, los cuales posteriormente meterá en su horno para coserlos y así estén listos para la venta. Los pedidos que tiene por lo general son muy grandes, por lo que pide ayuda de sus vecinos ladrilleros para cumplir con el pedido, con la promesa de ayudarlos cuando ellos necesiten de él.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es hacer los ladrillos, ya que siente que juega con el barro y no tanto que trabaja. Lleva 5 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es acomodar los ladrillos en el horno, ya que tiene que ponerlos de forma que todos cosan por igual. 
Para el futuro, espera que su negocio progrese y pueda mejorar sus ingresos económicos.

Este es el cuarto préstamo de Elmer con MFP y no quiere dejar de pagarlo por falta de dinero, así que ya está haciendo contactos para vender sus ladrillos. Él es el único varón de su banco comunal por lo que siempre trata de ser responsable y respetuoso con sus compañeras. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará nuevos moldes para hacer ladrillos y así incrementar la cantidad que produce diariamente.
texts.en:
Elmer is a very simple and hard-working 21 year old young man. He lives in his own house made of adobe, together with his wife Micaela, who is 19 years old, and his beloved son Ton, who is 1, and to whom he wishes to give a good future.

His days as a brick-maker are very long and hard. He wakes up at 6 o'clock in the morning to mix and mold the bricks, which he will then put in his oven to bake, and then they will be ready to sell. The orders that he has are generally very large, and so therefore he requests help from his neighbors, who are also brick-makers, in order to complete the requests, with the promise to help them when they need his help. What he likes most about his work is making the bricks, since he feels like he is playing with the clay and its not like work. He has been doing this work for 5 years and he considers the most difficult part putting the bricks in the oven, since he has to put them in a way that they all cook evenly. For the future, he hopes that his business progresses and that he is able to improve his income.

This is Elmer's fourth loan with MFP and he doesn't want to miss any payments for lack of money, so he is already making contacts to sell his bricks. He is the only young man in his community bank, so therefore he always tries to be responsible and respectful of his female colleagues. With the 2,000 new soles he is requesting, he will buy new molds for making bricks, and thus increase the quantity that he produces daily.

Translated from Spanish by Amy McGinty, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy brick molds

loans.name: Ayten

texts.en: Ayten Q. is 21 years old. She sells electrical goods such as electrical cookers, air funnels, mini fans and irons. She has three years of experience in this field and is doing very well. Ayten is friendly and polite with clients and, at the same time, she knows every single detail about the items she sells which is very helpful for customers. Ayten applied for 1400 Azerbaijani manats to increase her stock. She believes she can make some savings for her dowry.

loans.use: To purchase more items to sell

loans.name: San Martin De Porres Group

texts.es:
EL BANCO DE EMPRENDIMIENTO  SAN MARTIN DE PORRES SE COMPONE POR UNA MESA DIRECTIVA : 

LA PRESIDENTA ES LA SEÑORA ANA QUE SE DEDICA A LA RESPOSTERIA Y VENTA DE PLASTICOS, QUE VIVE EN CASA DE ANTICRETICO JUNTO A SU ESPOSO Y SUS 3 HIJOS EN LA ZONA DE SANTA ROSA NORTE.LA PAREJA TRABAJA FUERTE PARA SACAR A SUS HIJOS ADELANTE YA QUE SE ENCUENTRAN EN EDAD ESCOLAR Y UNO DE SUS DESEOS ES VER A SUS HIJOS PROFESIONALES, CON EL DINERO DEL CREDITO COMPRARA MERCADERIA COMO SER: JARRAS, VALDES,PANEROS,ETC. TODOS DE PLASTICO 

LA SECRETARIA  ES LA SEÑORA SUSANA QUE SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE COSMETICOS POR CATALOGO ELLA TRABAJA DE LUNES A SABADO EL DINERO DEL CREDITO LO UTILICARA PARA LA COMPRA DE PRODUCTOS DE BELLEZA YA QUE CUANDO HAY PROMOCION DE PRODUCTOS ELLA HACE PEDIDOS POR MAYOR PORQUE ES A UN COSTO BAJO Y LO VENDE AL PRECIO ORIGINAL, LA SEÑORA SUSANA VIVE EN CASA DE SUS PAPAS EN EL BARRIO CANADA.

LA TESORERA ES LA SEÑORA KAREN QUE SE DEDICA  A LA  VENTA DE COSMETICOS DURANTE 2 AÑOS TRABAJA DE LUNES A SABADO VIVE EN CASA DE SUS PAPAS EN LA ZONA DE JUAN XXIII, EL BANCO SE ENCUENTRACON CERO MORA  SE APOYAN ENTRE ELLAS SON PERSONAS RESPONSABLES, DINAMICAS Y TRABAJADORAS. 

EL DINERO DEL CREDITO SE UTILIZARA PARA EL INCREMENTO DE CAPITAL DE TRABAJO Y COMPRA DE MERCADERIA.

ESTAN AGRADECIDAS CON EMPRENDER Y KIVA POR LA CONFIANZA BRINDADA EN LA OTORGACION DEL CREDITO
texts.en:
The San Martin de Porres Enterprise Bank has a board of directors. The president is Senora Ana Maria, who bakes and sells plastics. She lives with her husband and 3 children in the Santa Rosa North area. The secretary is Senora Susana, who sells cosmetics from Monday through Saturday and lives in her parents' home in the Canada neighborhood. The treasurer is Senora Karen, who has sold cosmetics for two years from Monday through Saturday; she lives in her parents' home in the Juan XXIII area. The bank has no permanent location, they depend on one another. They are all dynamic, hard-working, and responsible persons. They are grateful that Emprender and Kiva have the confidence to grant them this credit.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase of working capital

loans.name: Kadidiatou Foulo

texts.fr: Kadidiatou Foulo D. est une femme de 34 ans, elle est mariée et mère d'un enfant. Elle est membre du Banc villageois de GADAPARA depuis 5 ans. Avec son crédit elle fait un petit commerce de crème, de jus de fruits naturels, de glace et de couscous au lait. Elle participe à la prise en charge familiale.
texts.en:
Kadidiatou Foulo D. is a 34-year-old woman; she is married and the mother of one child. She has been a member of the “Banc Villageois” of GADAPARA for five years. With her loan she will run her small business selling cream, natural fruit juices, ice cream and couscous with milk. She helps support her family.

Translated from French by Robin Clochard, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Promote her business

loans.name: Juana Del Rosario

texts.es: La señora Juana del Rosario H. C., es casa da y con su esposo el cual  se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 21 años vive en el Barrio San Caralampio, ellos tiene 5 hijos los cuales 3 están casados y los otros dos menores trabajan y estudian,  dentro de los planes diarios de la familia están el tener los recursos para mejorar su nivel de vida y la de sus hijos pero han tenido problemas por la falta de financiamiento de los organismos hacia este sector y que no puedan trasladar la cosecha debido a que no poseen un medio de transporte, ellos se dedican al cultivo de las frutas gracias a que su mamá le heredo unas tierras y las han trabajado desde entonces, es por esto que la familia decidió solicitar este préstamo con el objetivo de compra un camión que les ayude a distribuir la producción, garantizándoles un aumento en los ingresos mensuales que ha corto tiempo se traduzca en una mejora de sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs. Juana del Rosario H. C. is married and her husband has been working in agriculture for 21 years. They live in the neighborhood of San Caralampio; they have 5 children of whom 3 are married and the two youngest work and go to school. The family’s daily plans include having the resources to improve their own quality of life and of their children; however, they have had problems due to the lack of loans from organizations in the area and not having any means of transportation to move their crops. She grows fruit thanks to lands inherited from her mother; she has worked the land ever since. For this reason, the family decided to request a loan with the objective of buying a truck that will help them to distribute their production, guaranteeing an increase in their monthly income, which in a short time will translate in an improvement to their quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Carlos Morales, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy a work truck

loans.name: Akhmad

texts.en: Akhmad V. is a 48-year-old man. He is married and has three children. He sells fruits and vegetables in the central street of his home village in Agsu city. Akhmad started his business 12 years ago, and since that time, he has become a well-known entrepreneur. He sells potatoes, carrots, onions, greens, apples, and tomatoes. He applied for a loan of 1600 AZN in order to build his own shop. You can be an important part of Akhmad's business.

loans.use: To build his own store

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es una mujer de 34 años, muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive sola en la casa que le cedieron sus padres, no está casada y lo que más desea es vivir un futuro tranquilo.
El negocio de la sastrería es una actividad que le viene de familia, ya que aprendió este arte de su padre cuando todavía era muy joven. Su negocio es muy concurrido y sus clientes hacen cola para que les realice la confección de alguna prenda.
Pero a pesar que tiene muchos clientes ella trabaja sola, ya que sus ingresos económicos todavía no le permiten contratar a un ayudante con quien pueda acelerar la confección de los pedidos.
Por otro lado, lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es realizar el acabado a sus prendas, lleva 20 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día en su sastrería. 
Con el tiempo, anhela que su negocio crezca y que se convierta en uno de los talleres de confección más reconocidos de la ciudad de Juliaca.

Este es el sexto préstamo de Julia con MFP y está dispuesta a pagarlo puntualmente, ya que no desea causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal, donde participa activamente. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados comprara nuevos materiales para la confección de sus prendas.
texts.en:
Julia is a 34 year-old woman, very unassuming and hardworking. She lives alone in a house that her parents gave her. She is not married and she wishes most to lead a peaceful life. The tailor’s trade is an activity that comes to her through family, since she learned the art from her father when she was still very young. Her business is very popular and her clients line up so that she can tailor their garments. Even though she has many clients, she works alone since her income will not permit her to hire an assistant to help her speed up the preparation of her orders. On the other hand, the thing she likes most about her work is finishing the garment. She has spent 20 years tailoring and considers the most difficult part is to have to stay in her shop all day. Julia longs for her business to grow with time, and for it to become one of the most recognized tailoring shops in the city of Juliaca. This is the sixth loan that Julia has had with MFP and she has already arranged to make prompt payments as she has no wish to cause problems for her partners at the community bank where she participates actively. With the 2,000 nuevos soles (PEN) she is asking for, she would buy new materials to make her garments.

Translated from Spanish by Patrick Clarke, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy textile materials

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza, de 19 años, es una joven soltera muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en la casa de sus padres a quienes desea ayudar con los gastos del hogar.
Aunque todavía es muy joven está decidida a trabajar muy duro para ya no depender de sus padres, puesto que siente que es hora de sobresalir por sí misma. Para ello realiza tejidos artesanales, los cuales lleva a vender a su puesto de venta ubicado en la Explanada Laguna Temporal (lugar donde se realizan ferias en Juliaca).
A su vez, lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es tejer y más aun si son artesanías; lleva 2 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es trasladar los tejidos hasta su puesto de venta, ya que le resulta muy cansado.
Para más adelante, espera tener una tienda muy grande de ropa tejida a mano, en la cual pueda vender con más tranquilidad y atender mejor a sus clientes.

Este es el tercer préstamo de Maritza con MFP, ella ha sido muy puntual en sus pagos y nunca ha tenido problemas con su banco comunal, donde es la encargada de poner la cuota de alegría que mantiene a las demás socias muy contentas. Con los tres mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará mejores materiales para elaborar más tejidos artesanales y así incrementar la cantidad que tiene en stock.
texts.en:
19-year-old Maritza is a young, single woman who is very happy and hardworking. She lives in her parents' home, and wishes to help them with their household expenses. Although she is still very young, she has decided to work very hard so she doesn't have to depend on her parents; she feels it is time for her to get herself ahead. In order to do this, she makes woven handicrafts, which she sells from a booth in Explanada Laguna Temporal [Seasonal Lagoon Esplanade], a fair location in Juliaca. What she likes most about her job is weaving and making handicrafts. She has been doing this for two years, and she considers transporting the handicrafts to the sales point to be the most difficult part, as it makes her very tired. In the future, she hopes to have a large store for handmade clothing, where she can sell in a more relaxed manner and give better attention to her customers. This is Maritza's third loan with MFP. She has been very punctual in her payments and has never had problems with her communal bank, where she spreads joy that keeps the other members happy. With this loan of 3,000 soles, she will buy better materials to make more woven goods and increase the quantity she has in stock.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase materials for woven handicrafts

loans.name: Habibatou

texts.fr: Habibatou T. est une femme de 54 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. Elle est membre de Banc Villageois depuis 3 ans et a eu 6 bonnes expériences avec le crédit. Elle fait un petit commerce de poivre, de sel, d'oignon, de pâte d'arachide, d'huile végétale, de miel et de légumes. Elle participe à l'amélioration des conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Habibatou T. is a woman of 54. She is married and the mother of four children. She has been a member of Banc Villageois for three years and has had six successful experiences with loans. She runs a small trade, selling pepper, salt, onions, peanut-butter, vegetable oil, honey, and vegetables. She contributes to the betterment of her family's quality of life.

Translated from French by Carolyn McMahon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Strengthening her business

loans.name: Mercedes Del Socorro

texts.es: La señor  Mercedes del Socorro S. O. tiene 58 años de edad es madre soltera pero vive acompañada de sus hijas las cuales son mayores de edad y todas están casadas, la señora S. se dedica a la venta de tortillas y sus hijas le apoyan en su negocio, dentro de las aspiraciones de la  señora esta el poder remodelar su humilde casa y dejárselas a sus hijas para que moren con su familia y que así mismo se conviva en un ambiente mas cómodo y seguro para todos, el negocio desearía tener las posibilidades de ampliarlo y diversificarlo de forma que sea el sustento de todos, para esto la señora solicita de este préstamo con el objetivo de comprar leña y maiz que aumente las ventas y que signifique mejores condiciones de vida para todos.
texts.en:
Mercedes del Socorro S. O. is 58 years old and single. She lives with her grown daughters, all of whom are married. Ms. S. sells tortillas, and her daughters assist her in her business. Among her goals are being able to remodel her humble home and give it to her daughters so they can live with their families in an environment that is more comfortable and safe for everyone, and expanding and diversifying her business so that it can support everyone. In order to do this, she is requesting this loan to buy firewood and corn, which will increase her sales and improve living conditions for everyone.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase raw materials

loans.name: Deyvid Antonio

texts.es: Deyvid de 35 años de edad es soltero, trabaja para la UNAN CUR-Chontales desde hace varios años como maestro de ingles, tambien imparte clases en secundaria en el INACH. Esta solicitando su 1er credito a la institucion de AFODENIC para pagar la ultima cuota de su maestria y tramitar el titulo, pues no puede asumir estos gastos con su salario, pues a pesar de no estar casado ni tener hijos apoya a su familia con los gastos de la casa. Expresa que sus compañeros de trabajo le informaron que en AFODENIC estaban apoyando a las personas con deseos de superacion y decidio solicitar el financiamiento ya que la tasa de interes es bien accesible para las personas de escasos recursos.
texts.en:
Deyvid is 35 years old, single, and has worked for several years at UNAN CUR-Chontales [a vocational university in Nicaragua] as an English teacher. He also teaches secondary school classes for the organization INACH. He is seeking his first loan from AFODENIC to make the final payment for his Master's degree and title. He cannot pay off this cost with his salary, because even though he is single and childless, he still helps his family with their household expenses. His coworkers told him that AFODENIC supported people with a desire to excel, and he decided to apply for a loan because the interest rate was reasonable for people with scarce resources.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Payment for Master's degree and title

loans.name: Safiétou

texts.fr: Safiétou D. est âgée de 45 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants. Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de TOURECOUNDA depuis 3 ans et a eu 6 expériences avec le crédit. Elle fait un petit commerce de savon traditionnel, de sucre, de thé, de kolas, et de tabac. Son objectif est de renforcer son épargne et de participer à la prise en charge familiale.
texts.en:
Safiétou D. is 45 years old and the married mother of five children. She has been a member of the Banc Villageois of Tourécounda for three years and has had six successful loans. She runs a small trade, selling traditional soap, sugar, tea, kola nuts, and tobacco. Her goal is to strengthen her savings and contribute to her family expenses.

Translated from French by Carolyn McMahon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Better develop her business to generate revenue

loans.name: Basti

texts.en: Basti F. is a single 48-year-old woman who sells plates, cups, glasses, and other dishes for dowry. Most of her clients are young girls and brides who come to her store to buy beautiful dinner and tea sets or glasses. Basti has been running her store for 10 years. She applied for a loan in the amount of 1200 AZN so she can increase the number of items she sells and to purchase products that are in high demand like dinner and tea sets.

loans.use: To purchase more dinner and tea sets.

loans.name: Digana Emerita

texts.es: DOÑA DIGNA ES UNA COMERCIANETE DE PESCADO DE LA ZONA DE JIQUILILLO EN CHINANDEGA  TIENE 15 AÑOS DE TENER EL ACOPIO  Y ES UNA CLIENTA QUE COMENZO CON SOLO UNA PANA VENDIENDO AMBULANTE HOY EN DIA DEBIDO AL ESFUERZO EL NEGOCIO VA EN AUMENTO  SE PUEDE OBSERVAR EN LA FOTO UN DIA NORMAL DE TRABAJO EN EL ACOPIO
texts.en:
Mrs. Digna markets fish in the Jiquilillo area of Chinandega. For 15 years she has had a fish distribution business. She is a client who started out selling bread in the streets. Now, thanks to her efforts, her business is increasing. In the photograph you can see a normal working day in her fish business.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy a boat motor

loans.name: Assane

texts.fr: Assane TIANE est une femme de 48 ans, elle mariée et mère de 4 enfants. Depuis 3 ans elle est membre du Banc Villageois de GADAPARA et y a bénéficié de 6 prêts qu'elle a régulièrement remboursés. Elle fait la vente de petit déjeuner, de crème et de jus de fruits naturels. Elle participe à l'amélioration des conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Assane Tiane is a woman of 48. She is married and has four children. For three years, she has been a mamber of the Banc Villageois of Gadapara and has profited from six loans there, which she has repaid regularly. She sells breakfast, cream, and natural fruit juices. She contributes to the betterment of her family's quality of life.

Translated from French by Carolyn McMahon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase her investment capital

loans.name: Mariza Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Maritza del Socorro N. D., nació en 1974, en la ciudad de Managua es casada y su marido trabaja como guarda de seguridad, apoyándole económicamente en los gastos mensuales de su casa. Ellos habitan en el barrio Waspan Norte es madre de 5 hijos, y de ellos dependen únicamente dos de todos sus hijos, trabaja en el mercado oriental vendiendo comida rápida y refrescos la comida la prepara en su casa y la lleva a su puesto de venta en el Oriental, la peor desgracia que ha pasado en su vida ha sido un préstamo que solicitó hace 4 años y saliendo del Banco con U$ 5,000.00 fue asaltada despojándola de la esperanza de trabajar para mejorar su vida y la de su familia tras esto la señora se vio obligada a vender su tramo y reiniciar de nuevo con su negocio, hoy en día desea volver a intentar mejorar la venta y con un nuevo crédito y compararía un freezer para los refrescos y se supliría de más materia prima. Esto le beneficiaria económicamente para nuevos proyectos que tengan en sus vidas.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maritza del Socorro N. D., who was born in 1974 in the city of Managua, is married; her husband works as a security guard, supporting Maritza and covering the monthly household expenses.They live in the Waspan Norte neighborhood. Maritza is the mother of 5 children, only 2 of whom still depend on their parents. Maritza works in the eastern market in Managua, selling fast food and beverages. She prepares the food in her house and carries it to her food stall in the market. The worst misfortune that has occurred in Maritza's life has been a loan that she requested 4 years ago. As she left the bank with the 5000 US dollars in cash, she was assaulted. The experience stripped her of the hope of working to improve her life and the lives of her family members. To repay the loan that was stolen from her, she had to sell her market stall and restart her business from scratch. These days she wants to try again to improve her sales. With the new loan she will buy a freezer for the beverages and will imcrease her inventory of raw materials. This investment will benefit her economically; the increased earnings will be used for new projects in the family's lives.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase raw materials

loans.name: Lea Dagmar

texts.es: Lea Dagmar es casada, tiene 3 hijos, todos varones, los cuales estan estudiando, trabaja como sub-directora del Colegio Tierno Galván de la ciudad de Juigalpa, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo que asume los gastos del hogar.  La profesora Lea con los  créditos anteriores han podido salir adelante, mejorando poco a poco su vivienda que es una casa de proyecto y esta necesitando instalar todo el sistema electrico de la casa.  En su escuela es muy querida por sus compañeras de trabajo.
texts.en:
Lea Dagmar is married and has three children, all boys. They are students. Lea works as assistant principal at the Tierno Galván School in the town of Juigalpa. Her husband helps by paying for household expenses. Using previous loans Lea has been able to make her life better; she is gradually improving her house which is still a work in progress. She now needs to install a complete electrical system. Lea is much liked by her colleagues in the school.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to install an electrical system

loans.name: Mouskéba

texts.fr: Mouskéba D. est une femme de 54 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 5 enfants. Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de GADAPARA depuis 2 ans et demi. Elle a construit un four traditionnel où elle grille du pain vendu dans son quartier. Elle est très expérimentée en la matière pour l'avoir pratiquée depuis plus d'une décennie. Son objectif est de participer à la prise en charge familiale et de renforcer ses épargnes.
texts.en:
Mouskéba D. is a 54-year-old woman; she is married and the mother of five children. She has been a member of the “Banc Villegeois” of GADAPARA for two and a half years. She has built a traditional oven where she cooks bread sold in her neighborhood. She is very experienced with this work, having done it for more than a decade. Her goal is to participate in supporting her family and to build up her savings.

Translated from French by Robin Clochard, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase her investment capital

loans.name: Juana Mercedes

texts.es: La señora Juana Mercedes R. R., vive en el Barrio Waspan Norte tiene 41 años de edad y vive con su compañero de vida el cual es carretonero del Mercado oriental, tiene una hija la cual le apoya incondicionalmente en el negocio, ella se dedica a vender frutas y verduras a las orillas del mar  en una camioneta prestada, desea que le apoyen con este crédito pudiéndose comprar una camioneta debido a que se le han presentado problemas con el dueño del móvil por tal razón decidió comprarse una propia que le permita una mayor movilidad y decisión, esto le aseguraría un aumento en la ventas garantizándole una mejora en sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Señora Juana Mercedes R. R. lives in the neighbourhood of Waspan Norte. She is 41 years old and lives with her life partner who is a driver at the Oriental Market. She has a daughter who is a wonderful help in her business selling fruit and vegetables on the seashore from a rented pickup. Juana wants a loan so that she can buy a small pickup. She has had problems with the owner of the rented vehicle and so has decided to buy her own. It will give her greater mobility and decision-making capacity, ensuring more sales and guaranteeing an improvement in her standard of living.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy a pick up truck

loans.name: Victoria Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Victoria Del Carmen R. R., nació en 1960, en San Isidro, actualmente habita en el Barrio Laureles Norte, es madre soltera de 2 hijos, los cuales viven de forma independiente y les ayudan económicamente, ella trabaja como domestica y dentro de sus principales planes están el terminar la construcción de su casa, por tal razón solicita de este crédito con  el fin de finalizar de construir la pared de enfrente de su casa par at3ener mayor seguridad y tranquilidad debido a que el lugar donde habita presenta altos índices de inseguridad ciudadana, esto le aseguraría en gran medida mejores condiciones de vida .
texts.en:
Señora Victoria Del Carmen R. R. was born in 1960 in San Isidro. She now lives in the neighbourhood of Laureles Norte. She is a single mother and has two children who are independent and help her financially. Victoria has a job as a domestic servant. Her main goal is to finish building her house, so she is asking for a loan so that the wall in front of her house can be completed. This would give her greater security and peace of mind as the area in which she lives has a high crime rate. As much as is possible, a wall would guarantee better living conditions.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to build a wall in front of her house

loans.name: Las Hermanas Group

texts.es: El grupo las hermanas está integrado por tres mujeres que se consideran hermanas por ello el nombre. Estas son  Sofía G. quien tiene una pulpería, Martha Lorena B. quien vende cosméticos y  Teresa de Jesús E. que comercializa ropa.
texts.en:
The group "Las Hermanas" (The Sisters) is made up of three woman who consider themselves to be like sisters, and this explains their group name. They are: Sofía G., who has a small grocery store, Martha Lorena B., who sells cosmetics, and Teresa de Jesús E., who sells clothing.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy staple grains, meat, soft drinks, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Juana Epifanía

texts.es: La señora Juana tiene venta de comida las cuales realiza los fines de semana el crédito lo utilizara para invertirlo en el mismo y así poder darle una mejor atención a sus clientes, estos créditos con CEPRODEL del cual ha trabajado un año le han beneficiado a mejorar su calidad de vida y los ingresos para su familia, el negocio lo tiene desde hace mas de diez años y empezó con ahorros propios, ella vive con su esposo donde los dos trabajan hombro a hombro.
texts.en:
Señora Juana sells food on the weekends. She will use this loan to invest in this business so she can give her customers better service. She has worked with Ceprodel for one year, and these loans have benefited her and have let her improve her quality of life as well as her family's income. She has had this business for more than 10 years. She started it with her own savings. She lives with her husband, and they both work side by side.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase soft drinks, juice, chicken, meat, ketchup, etc.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco J. es una persona trabajadora que desde hace 28 años se dedico a ser voceador de un periódico muy conocido y saco a sus hijos adelante, hace poco quedo viudo pero aún así quiere hacerle mejoras a su casa, por que el techo es de  lamina lo cual  esta muy deteriorada y necesita comprar nuevas laminas para que no se le trasmine el agua cuando llueve o se sienta muy frió en el invierno. 
Este proyecto que el tiene es mas que todo para no sufrir tanto la soledad y la tristeza de haber perdido un ser querido muy importante en su vida.
texts.en:
Francisco J. is a hard working man that has been a well-known news reporter for the past 28 years and has worked hard to raise his children. His wife passed away not too long ago but he still wants to improve his home, as the ceiling is falling apart and he needs to fix it to stop the rain from coming in, and so that his house doesn't get as cold in the winter. This project means a lot to him now, and working on it will help Francisco not suffer as much the loniless and sadness of having lost a very important person in his life.

Translated from Spanish by Mariana Dauwe, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To fix home's ceiling

loans.name: Erling

texts.es: La señora Erling C. nació en San Carlos en el Año de 1956, vive actualmente en el Barrio Laureles Norte tiene tres hijos y todos son mayores de edad, tiene  una negocio de alquiler de cuartos y vive con su compañero el cual realiza trabajos de casa como radiotécnico apoyándole económicamente a la economía del hogar, ella desea una préstamo para remodelar lo cuartos ya que actualmente son de Plycem y los quiere construir de bloque para brindar mayor seguridad a sus arrendatarios, así mismo lograría mayor calidad, durabilidad y mejor precio de alquiler por los cuartos, esto le permitiría una mejor entrada de dinero ayudándola a mejorar su nivel de vida y la de su familia y brindándole el capital necesario para nuevos proyectos a futuro.
texts.en:
Señora Erling C. was born in San Carlos in 1956. She currently lives in the Laureles Norte neighborhood. She has 3 children, who are all adults. She has a business renting rooms. She lives with her companion, who does work in houses like electrical work so he can support the home economically. She would like a loan so she can remodel the rooms since they are currently built with plywood. She would like to build them with bricks to offer better security to her tenants. They will also be more durable and of better quality so she can charge a higher price for them. This will let her make more money and help her improve her quality of life and that of her family and to generate the necessary capital for future projects.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To remodel the rooms that she rents out

loans.name: Las Originales Group

texts.es: Las originales está conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras ellas son Juana O. la cual desde hace años vende zapatos, Deyanira H. que tiene un taller de costura y Darling Yesenia S. vende cosméticos.
texts.en:
The "Originales" group is made up of three hard-working women: Juana Orodoñez has sold shoes for several years, Deyanira Hernándz has a sewing business, and Darling Yesenia S. sells cosmetics.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase shoes to sell

loans.name: Norberta Veronica

texts.es:
El que aparece en la foto es padre de Norberta T..
Norberta es una persona emprendedora que esta dispuesta apoyar su papa en lo que ella pueda. El señor ya es de edad avanzada pero no quiere sentirse una persona inútil a pesar de sus años. Es por ello que Norberta lo apoya en poner un negocio de abarrotes que tiene 8 años establecido, pero por el momento quiere surtirse de mercancía con más variedad de artículos. 
El señor abre desde temprano y es quien atiende en negocio mientras su hija sale por las mañana trabajar en una maquiladora para tener mas ingresos ya que es madre de 2 hijos a quienes tamben tiene que ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
The person who appears in the photo is Norbeta T.’s father. Norbeta is an entrepreneurial person who is determined to support her father however she can. He is elderly, but he does not want to feel like a useless person in spite of his age. That is why Norberta helped him set up a grocery business, which was established eight years ago. Now she wants to stock it with a greater variety of merchandise. He opens very early, and he tends the business himself. His daughter leaves early in the morning to work in a factory to get more income because she has two children. She also has to give them a better quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy merchandise for the business

loans.name: Mujeres Victoriosas Group

texts.es: Mujeres Victoriosas es un grupo integrado por cuatro mujeres luchadoras estas son Guadalupe del Carmen H. quien vende gaseosa, Concepción H. quien tiene una distribuidora de gaseosa y vende ropa por encargo, Joselyn Teresa M. vende ropa y zapatos y Ana L. quien también vende ropa.
texts.en:
"Mujeres Victoriosas" [Victorious Women] is a group made up of four determined women: Guadalupe del Carmen H. sells soft drinks, Concepción H. distributes soft drinks and sells clothing, Joselyn Teresa M. sells clothing and shoes, and Ana L. also sells clothing.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel C. B. se dedica a vender abarrotes al mayoreo y menudeo desde hace 5 años. Este negocio es llamado “Distribuidora de abarrotes el mago Feliz” lo que hace es ir por los negocios pequeños a surtirles de mercancía dependiendo de cómo necesiten el articulo, el se traslada en una camioneta grande donde carga la mercancía y así distribuye su mercancía. En este momento el pide del apoyo para mejor el negocio y poner nuevos artículos para así vender mas variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Daniel has been selling groceries wholesale and to the retail trade for 5 years. His business is called "Happy Wizard Grocery Distributor" and what he does is go to small businesses and supply them with goods depending on their needs. He gets around in a large van that he fills with his goods, and in this way he distributes his supplies. At the moment, he requests support to improve his business and add new items so that he can offer his customers more variety.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Hynd, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To supply his business

loans.name: Eduardito Group

texts.es: El grupo Eduardito está comformado por Xiomara G. quien tiene un taxi y vende ropa, Fátima F. quien administra un kiosco en el monte Sinaí y Xiomara Montes tiene una barbería. Ellas son mujeres trabajadoras que lo que más desean es ayudar en su hogar.
texts.en:
The "Eduardito" group is comprised of Xiomara G., who has a taxi service and sells clothing; Fátima F., who runs a kiosk in Mount Sinai; and Xiomara Montes, who has a barber shop. They are hard-working women who want more than anything to help their families.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To make improvements to a taxi and to purchase clothing to sell

loans.name: Amparo Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Amparo tiene negocio de venta de comida, el crédito lo utilizara para invertirlo al negocio incrementando su capital de trabajo y así poder tener un mayor ingreso para su familia, la señora ha tenido tres créditos con CEPRODEL y con ellos ha mejorado su calidad de vida ya que podido mejorar su negocio,   es madre de 4 hijos de los cuales dos están en edad escolar y dependen de ella.
Su negocio lo tiene ubicado en la alcaldía de Nindirí trabaja de lunes a viernes y los días sábados y domingos vende comida en su casa esto para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos a los cuales quiere much
texts.en:
Señora Amparo has a business selling food. She will use this loan to invest in her business and to increase her working capital so she can have a better income for her family. She has had 3 loans with Ceprodel, and with them, she has improved her quality of life and her business. She is the mother of 4 children, 2 of whom are of school age and still depend on her. Her business is located in the town of Nindirí, and she works there from Monday through Friday. On Saturdays and Sundays, she sells food in her home to be able to take good care of her children, whom she loves very much.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase ramen noodles, toilet paper, soft drinks, juices, purified water, and candy

loans.name: Transito Humberto

texts.es: El Sr. Transito tiene 54 años de edad es casado tiene 5 hijos ya mayores de edad, su conyugue labora como empleada del hogar, ellos cuentan con casa propia de material  en construccion, el se dedica como operario de construccion  adicionalmente cuenta con una moto taxi el cual lo alquila, el se inicio como operario de construccion hace 10 años, el actualmente esta laborando el San Miguel en la construccion de una casa.El Sr. Transito cuenta con metas y objetivos uno de ellos es poder tener su casa construida,  con el dineroque solicita invertira en la culminacion de la cosntruccion de su casa.
texts.en:
Señor Transito is 54, married, and has 5 adult children. His wife works as a domestic employee. They have their own home, which is under construction. Señor Transito works as a construction worker and also has a motorcycle rickshaw that he rents out. He started working as a construction worker 10 years ago. He currently works in San Miguel building a house. His goals are to finish building his house. He will use the money that he is requesting to finish building it.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To improve his home

loans.name: Rufina

texts.es: La  Sra. Rufina  tiene 57 años de edad ella es casada tinen 3 hijos ya  mayores de edad. Su conyugue tiene un pequeño taller de carpinteria. La Sra. Rufina tiene un negocio de una bodega bien surtida de productos de primera necesidad,  frutas, verduras y otros productos  bazar, su negocio esta ubicado en su mismo domicilio en la Tinguiña una casa de material noble de un piso en una buena ubicacion. Ella inicio su negocio hace 12 años es una de las tiendas mas antiguas. La Sra. Rufina cuenta con metas y objetivos uno de ellos es poder incrementar su negocio. Con el dinero que solicita invertira en capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Señora Rufina is 57, is married, and has 3 adult children. Her husband has a small carpenter's shop. Rufina has a small grocery store that is well-supplied with basic goods like fruits, vegetables, and other various products. It is located in her own home in La Tinguiña. Her home is made out of good material and is in a good location. She started her business 12 years ago and is one of the oldest stores in the area. Rufina's goal is to grow her business. She will use the money she is requesting as working capital.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To supply her business

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es: La Sra. Natia tiene 60 años de edad ella es madre soltera tiene hijos ya mayores de edad el cual ya no viven con ella. Ella vive en prolongacion 3 de octubre en el Distrito de la Tinguiña en casa de material noble. Ella se dedica a  la venta de pescado en el mercado La Palma en puesto propio, ella se dedica a este negocio hace 12 años. La Sra. Natia a pesar de su edad es una persona trabajadora, con sueños y objetivos, uno de ellos es poder adquirir otro puesto, con el dinero que solicita invertira en mojoras de su local.
texts.en:
Natalia is 60 years of age. She is a single mother. She has adult children who do not live with her. She lives in the district of Tinguiña in a brick house. She is dedicated to selling fish in the La Palma market from her own stall. She has been dedicated to this business for twelve years. Despite her age, Natalia is a hard-working person, with dreams and goals. One of them is to be able to acquire another stall. With the money she is requesting, she will invest in improvements in her store.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Housing improvements

loans.name: Victor Jesus

texts.es: El Sr. Victor tiene 57 años de edad el es conviviente con su segundo compromiso,  no tiene carga familiar tiene 3 hijastros  ya mayores de edad, ellos viven en la casa de su conviviente  casa de material de adobe en el Distrito de la Tinguiña, el Sr. Victor se dedica como operario de construccion, se dedica a prestar este servcio de albañileria hace 10 años, actualmente viene realizando una obra en  El Distrito de la  Venta. El Sr. Victor tiene muchos sueños y objetivos uno de ellos es poder tener una mejor casa para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, con el dinero que solicita invertira en  mejoras del techo de su cocina.
texts.en:
Victor is 57 years old and lives with his second partner. He does not have parental responsibilities. He has three stepchildren who are adults. They live in the same home as his spouse, which is made from adobe in the district of Tinguiña. Victor works as a construction worker. He has been dedicated to providing masonry services for ten years. Currently, he's working on a job in the Venta district. Victor has many dreams and goals, one of which is to be able to have a better house to give a better quality of life to his family. With the money that he is requesting, he will invest in improvements to the roof of his kitchen.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: House improvements

loans.name: Maria Graciela

texts.es: La Sra. Maria tiene 36 años de edad es casada tine 2 hijos de 15 y 13 años de edad, su conyugue es profesor de educacion fisica, cuentan con casa propia de material noble el cual recien esta en construccion. La Sra. Maria cuenta con negocio de la venta de  productos de piñateria, vta de abarrotes,  alquiler de sillas para eventos. Ella se inicio hace 10 años, en este negocio. La Sra. Maria es una persona muy activa con muchas metas y objetivos, uno de ellos es poder tener otro negocio mas y tener su casa ya construida.Con el dinero que solicita invertira en capital de trabajo para invertir en capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Maria is 36 years old. She is married and has two children who are 15 and 13 years old. Her spouse is a physical education teacher. They have their own brick home, which was recently built. Maria has a business selling piñata products, groceries and renting chairs for events. She began this business ten years ago. Maria is an active person with many goals and objectives. One of these is to be able to have another business and own her existing house. With the money she is requesting, she will invest in her business (as working capital).

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Implementation of her business.

loans.name: Mary Rosa's Group

texts.es: La Sra. Mary  tiene 47 años de edad es casada  su conyugue lo apoya en su negocio el tambien se dedica a la venta de pan como ambulante, tienen 3 hijos 2 de ellos menores de edad, cuentan con casa propia de material de adobe de un piso. La Sra. Mary se inicio en la venta de molidos hace 10 años  actualmente esta vendiendo sus productos en el mercado toledo en local alquilado. Ella  es una persona muy activa  y progresista comenso con su negocio pequeño actualmente tienens un negocio de regular capital de trabajo, Ella tiene muchos sueños y objetivos uno de ellos es poder tener su propio puesto comercial. Con el dinero que solicita invertir en capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Mary is 47 years old. She is married and her husband supports her in her business. He also works selling bread as a street vendor. They have 3 children, 2 of whom are under 18, and they live in a 1-story adobe house that they own. Mary began selling milled grains and spices 10 years ago, and is currently selling her products in the Toledo Market in a rented stall. She is a very dynamic and progress-minded person. She started with a very small enterprise and now has a business that provides a steady income. Mary has many dreams and goals; one of them is to be able to own her own store space. With the loan money she is requesting she will invest in working capital to expand her business.

Translated from Spanish by Catherine Fountain, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Expand her business

loans.name: Janet

texts.es: L. Sra. Janet tiene 36 años D. edad  es conviviente tiene 2 hijos en edad escolar, su conyugue trabaja como panificador, elL. cuenta con una bodega bien surtida D. productos D. primera necesidad, frutas y verduras, elL. cuenta con exte negocio hace 9 años, su negocio esta ubicado en pasaje el huerto  en casa propia D. material noble D. un piso. L. Sra. Janet cuenta con muchos suueños  y objetivos uno D. ellos es poder tener una casa mucho mas amplia, con el dinero que solicita invertira en  incrementar su capaital D. trabajo.
texts.en:
Janet is 36 years old. She has two children who are school age. Her spouse works as a baker. She has a store that is well stocked with basic products, fruits and vegetables. She has had this business for nine years. Her business is located in a passage in the garden of her one-storey home, which is maD. from brick. Janet has many dreams and goals. One of these is to be able to have a bigger house. With the money she is requesting, she will invest in increasing her working capital.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For working capital.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis tiene 25 años de edad es soltero vive en la casa de su abuela juntamente con sus padres ellos viven en la Tinguiña en casa de material noble de un piso, el  cuenta con una moto taxi el cual adquirio con financiamiento del Crediscotia, el se inicio en esta actividad como chofer de moto, actualmente cuenta con vehiculo propio. Luis tiene muchos sueños y objetivos uno de ellos es poder tener  mas vehiculos, con el dinero que solicita relaizara mantenimiento general de su vehiculo.
texts.en:
Luis is 25 years old. He is single and lives in his grandmother's house along with his parents. They live in Tinguiña in a brick, one-storey house. He has a moto-taxi, which he acquired with a loan from Crediscotia. He began with this job as a driver. Currently, he has his own vehicle. Luis has many dreams and goals. One of them is to have more vehicles. He will use the money he is requesting for general maintenance of his vehicle.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: General maintenance of his vehicle.

loans.name: Belsabe

texts.es:
Belsabé es una comerciante de 33 años, trabaja en coordinación con su esposo para cubrir los gastos de su hogar. Ellos tienen dos hijos; Brenda de 14 y Alejandra de 5 años, quienes son la alegría de su casa.
Durante el invierno se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, esta actividad la inicia a partir de las 11 de la mañana, horario cuando encuentra a sus clientes en sus casas; y por las tardes visita a las clientes en sus trabajos. En este éste negocio lleva 6 años y recién siente que está cosechando el fruto de su esfuerzo.  
Para esta estación de verano está vendiendo accesorios de aseo personal en la playa, y teniendo 14 años de comerciante, ya es reconocida en la zona.
Belsabé es una mujer muy amigable y conversadora, y vender es lo que mejor sabe hacer, por ello aprovecha todas las oportunidades que se le presenten.
Para el futuro, anhela tener una tienda de adornos y joyas en su casa, para eso está segura que debe trabajar muchísimo más.

Aunque este sea el cuarto crédito que tiene con MFP, ratifica su compromiso de pagar sus cuotas con puntualidad, ya que su anhelo es seguir trabajando responsablemente para surgir en la vida. El dinero que ahora solicita lo utilizará en el incrementó de productos de belleza y accesorios de higiene, para aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Belsabé is a trader who is 33 years old. She works in coordination with her husband to cover the bills. They have two children: Brenda who is 14 and Alejandra who is 5, who are the happiness of the home. During the winter, she is dedicated to selling beauty products. She begins this activity at 11 in the morning, a time when she finds her customers in their homes. And in the afternoons, she visits her customers at their jobs. She has been running this business for six years and recently she feels she is benefiting from the fruit of her labors. For the summer season, she is selling personal grooming products at the beach and through having 14 years experience as a trader, she is well known in the area. Belsabé is a very friendly woman and a conversationalist and selling is what she knows how to do best. For this, she takes advantage of all the opportunities that crop up. For the future, she longs to have an accessories and jewelry store in her home. For this, she is sure that she needs to work a lot more. Although this is the fourth loan that she's had with MFP, she affirms her promise to make her payments punctually since her dream is to continue working responsibly to get ahead in life. The money that she is requesting now will be used to increase her stock of beauty products and hygiene accessories to increase her sales.

Translated from Spanish by Kate Divjak, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase of merchandise.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita es una mujer amante de las caminatas, considera que es bueno para la salud. Ella tiene 49 años y está separada del padre de sus hijos. Actualmente vive con su hija Karen de 28 años.
Cada día se levanta muy temprano para cocinar los alimentos de su hogar, ya que a las 9 de la mañana empieza su labor como enfermera de un centro de salud, donde labora por horas. 
A partir de las 5 de la tarde recorre la calles de su barrio con su catalogo en mano para mostrar las ofertas de cosméticos.
En esta actividad tiene cerca de un año y le gusta muchísimo porque conoce gente con la que conversa y entabla amistades duraderas. A veces se siente cansada por las caminatas, pero debe hacerlo; no sólo por su trabajo, sino también por salud. 
Margarita anhela con el tiempo comprarse vitrinas donde pueda organizar todo su stock de cosméticos, pues así se verán mucho más atractivos.

Este es su tercer crédito con MFP y está segura de ser cumplida con sus pagos, como lo fue con sus anteriores préstamos, ya que sabe que en los negocios es muy importante el apoyo de un crédito. El dinero que ahora solicita es para la compra de más productos, para que pueda vender no sólo mostrando el catalogo, sino también con el producto en las manos.
texts.en:
Margarita is a woman who loves walking, she considers it good for the health. She is 49 and is separated from the father of her children. Currently she lives with her daughter Karen who is 28. She gets up very early every day to cook the food for the house, as at nine in the morning she begins her work as a nurse at a health centre, where she works for hours. From 5 in the afternoon she travels the streets of her suburb with her catalogue in hand to show her cosmetic offers. She has done this for close to a year and likes it a lot because she can meet people who she can talk with and strike up lasting friendships. Sometimes she feels tired with all the walking, but she must do it; not only for her work, but also for her health. Margarita longs for the time she can buy display cabinets where she can organize all her cosmetic stock, then they will be a lot more appealing. This is her third loan with MFP and she is confident of fulfilling her payments, as was the case with her previous loans, since she knows that in business the support from a loan is very important. The money that she is asking for now is for the purchase of more products, so that she can sell not just by showing the catalogue, but also with the product in the hand.

Translated from Spanish by Catherine Dent, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase stock

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Víctor es un hombre muy laborioso y responsable de 48 años, él está al cuidado de su madre anciana, y a pesar que nunca se casó y no tiene hijos es muy cariñoso con los niños. Su casa está ubicada en una zona muy alejada de la ciudad, lugar muy apropiado para la actividad que realiza. 

Él es vigilante de un centro minero, trabaja de 6 de la tarde a 7 de la mañana. En sus horas libres le gustaba hacer negocio, anteriormente vendía carbón y pescado pero no le fue rentable. Un buen día, una anciana le regaló un cerdito pequeño mientras  caminaba por el campo, él pensó que le quitaría mucho tiempo y se rehusaba, finalmente accedió a criarlo. 
Cuando llegó al peso adecuado usó su carne para preparar “chicharrones” (carne frita en olla), y vendió varias porciones. Jamás imaginó en convertirse en un exitoso cocinero y vendedor de chicharrones, por lo que ahora cría sus propios cerdos. Aunque Víctor no pudo encontrar a la anciana que le regaló su primer cerdo, vive agradecido a ella porque fue el inicio de su actual actividad económica.

Este es el segundo préstamo que tiene con MFP y está muy contento por los resultados de sus inversiones y por la responsabilidad de sus compañeras de grupo. Con el dinero que ahora solicita construirá un corral apropiado para sus 7 cerdos, pues su meta es incrementar la cantidad para tener un restaurante grande de chicharrones.
texts.en:
Víctor, 48, is a hard-working, responsible man who is responsible for his mother's care. Although he has never married and has no children of his own, he is very affectionate with children. His house is very far from the city but it is a very appropriate location for the work he does. He is a watchman at a mine; he works from 6pm until 7am. During his time off he likes to engage in commercial activities. He used to sell charcoal and fish but this turned out to be not very profitable. One day, while he was walking in the countryside, an old woman gave him a piglet. He thought the piglet would require a lot of his time so he wasn't too anxious to accept it. Finally, however, he agreed to raise it. When the piglet reached the proper weight, he used its meat to prepare "chicarrones" (pot-fried pork) and he sold a few portions. He never imagined that he would become a successful cook and chicarron salesman. He now raises his own pigs. Although Víctor was never able to find the old woman who gave him his first pig again, he lives grateful to her for having started him off on his current economic activity. This is his second loan with MFP and he is very happy with the results of his past investment and for the level of responsibility of his fellow group members. The funds requested will be used to build a corral that will be adequate to raise his 7 pigs since his goal is to increase the number of animals so that he can have a large chicarron restaurant.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To build a corral for his pigs.

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie S. is from the village of Westfield, Iponan, Cagayan de Oro City. She is 31 years old. Margie is married and has two school-aged children. To make a living, Margie buys and sells electronic loads (phone use cards) to the local community. Margie has been engaged in her business for over two years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Margie joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Margie has successfully repaid a previous loan of 5,000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to purchase additional products to sell. Margie is requesting a new loan of 8,000 PHP, which will be used to invest in expanding the business. This loan will be the second loan taken out by Margie from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To invest in expanding the business

location.town: Iponan, Cagayan de Oro, Misamis Oriental

loans.name: Placida

texts.en:
Placida G. is from the village of San Isidro, Talakag, Bukidnon. She is 56 years old. Placida is married and has four adult children. To make a living, Placida owns & operates a sari-sari (variety) store where she sells both food & daily use products in the local community. Placida has been engaged in her business for over five years and earns approximately 8,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2009, Placida joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Placida has successfully repaid a previous loan of 5,000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to purchase additional products to sell. Placida is requesting a new loan of 8,000 PHP, which will be used to invest in expanding the business. This loan will be the second loan taken out by Placida from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. 

About HSPFI:

HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet M. runs a sari-sari (variety retail shop) selling food and daily use products in her community. She is 25 years old, married and has one small child. They are from the village of San Isidro, Talakag, Bukidnon. Juliet has been in her business for over three years and earns approximately 8,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) a month. In 2009, Juliet joined HSPFI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living conditions and enable her to engage in business activities. Juliet has successfully repaid a previous loan of 5,000 PHP from HSPFI which was used to purchase products to sell. Juliet is requesting a new loan of 8,000 PHP which will be used to invest in expanding the business. This will be her second loan from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue to improve and expand her business. About HSPFI: HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao. Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Alida

texts.es:
Alida es una joven madre de 21 años, vive con su pareja, Percy de 25 años, con quien tiene dos hermosas hijas; María de 2 a y Kritsi de un año. 
Desde hace 2 años se dedica a sembrar papa, arveja, maíz y flor de gladiolo con la ayuda de su esposo .También tiene 2 vacas, algunas ovejas, 2 caballos y 2 asnos con los que transporta los insumos agrícolas hacia sus terrenos.
Cuando ella era adolescente tenía muchos sueños, que por un tiempo vio truncados, pero las ganancias que percibe ahora por la comercialización de sus productos le permiten vivir cómodamente, por eso para el futuro desea comprar más cabezas de ganado y sembrar en mayor cantidad.

Este es el segundo préstamo que tiene con MFP y  se compromete ante su banco comunal a ser puntual en sus pagos, para que el grupo siga creciendo. Con el dinero que ahora solicita comprará una bolsa de semilla de arveja, abono y fertilizantes que le brindaran una cosecha fructífera.
texts.en:
Alida is a young, 21-year old mother. She lives with her husband Percy, age 25. They have 2 daughters: María, age 2, and Kristi, age 1. For 2 years Alida has planted potatoes, peas, corn and gladiola flowers with the help of her husband. She also has 2 cows, some sheep, 2 horses, and 2 donkeys, which she uses to bring farm supplies to her land. When she was young Alida had many dreams, which were cut short for a time. But the income she earns now from selling her products allow her to live comfortably. Thus in the future she hopes to buy more livestock and plant more. This is her second loan with MFP and she promises her community bank that she will be punctual in her payments, so that the group can continue growing. With the money she is requesting she will buy seeds to grow peas, and organic and chemical fertilizers that will bring her a bountiful harvest.

Translated from Spanish by Vivian Lu, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Eliel

texts.es:
Eliel es un joven luchador de 22 años, está casado con Nicida, de 20 años, con quien tiene una hija de 3 años. Esta joven familia vive en su humilde casa propia en la sierra central del Perú.
A pesar que fue padre a muy temprana edad, desde que vio a su hija supo que tenía que salir adelante porque su familia que confiaba en él. Por eso, desde hace 3 años, con la ayuda de su esposa siembra papa, arveja, flor de gladiolo y habas, en terrenos cedidos por su padre y en otros arrendados para obtener mayor productividad.
Esta pareja es consciente que viven de la agricultura porque les permite mantener su hogar y poder amoblar su vivienda hasta lograr una adecuada calidad de vida. Pese a que el trabajo diario es sacrificado, Eliel está contento porque pronto implementará una bodega en su pueblo, para que su esposa se encargue de ella, sin descuidar a su pequeña, que en este año ya empezará a ir a la escuela.
Pero Eliel también desea concluir su proyecto de ampliar su fábrica procesadora de papa en la ciudad de Lima, que había dejado de lado, y por supuesto continuará sembrando en mayor cantidad.

Este es el segundo préstamo que tiene con MFP y está seguro que lo pagará a tiempo, además  a él le gusta trabajar con los integrantes de su banco comunal porque son buenas personas que siempre están dispuestos a poyar a los demás. El dinero que ahora solicita lo piensa invertir en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de arveja, abono orgánico, fertilizantes para acelerar su crecimiento e insecticidas para evitar la proliferación de plagas. Es así que en la foto muestra el terreno que sembrará en estos días.
texts.en:
Eliel is a determined young man of 22. He is married to Nicida, age 20, with whom he has a 3-year old daughter. This young family lives in a humble home they own in the central mountains of Perú. Despite becoming a father at a very young age, Eliel knew he had to improve his life from the moment he saw his daughter because his family was relying on him. That's why for the last 3 years, with the help of his wife, he has planted potatoes, peas, gladiola flower and beans on land given to him by his father and also on leased land, to increase production. The couple is aware that they owe their livelihood to farming because it allows them to furnish their home and maintain an adequate quality of life. Although his daily work requires self-sacrifice, Eliel is happy because he will soon set up a store in town that his wife will attend to while also being able to care for their daughter, who starts school this year. But Eliel also wishes to complete the expansion of his potato processing factory in Lima city, that he has had to leave aside. He will also continue to increase the scale of his farming. This is his second loan from MFP and he is certain that he will repay it on time. He enjoys working with the members of his community bank because they are good people that are always quick to support one another. Eliel plans to invest the money he is requesting in the purchase of a bag of seeds for planting peas, organic and chemical fertilizers to speed up crop growth, and insecticide for pest control. The photo shows the land that Eliel will be farming.

Translated from Spanish by Vivian Lu, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Daylinda

texts.en: Daylinda M. is from the village of Burnay, Gitagum, Misamis Oriental. She is 60 years old. Daylinda is married and has three adult children. To make a living, Daylinda runs a sari-sari (variety) retail shop. The main source of income for the business comes from selling both food and daily-use products in the local community. Daylinda has been engaged in her business for over five years and earns approximately 5,000 Philippine pesos a month for these activities. In 2008, Daylinda joined HSPFI, a Kiva partner, to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Daylinda has successfully repaid a previous loan of 8,000 PHP from HSPFI. This previous loan was used to purchase additional products to sell. Daylinda is requesting a new loan of 11,000 PHP, which will be used to invest in expanding the business. This will be the third loan taken out by Daylinda from HSPFI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve/expand her business. About HSPFI: HSPFI is one of the accredited partners of Opportunity International in the Philippines. It is based in Cagayan de Oro City and is reaching out to the poor households of Northern Mindanao. *Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, we created this template for our field staff to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To invest in expanding the business

loans.name: Amilcar

texts.es:
Amilcar es un joven muy humilde y trabajador de 25 años, es soltero y vive al cuidado de su padre de 77 años. Ambos viven en su casa (propia) ubicada en una zona fría de la sierra del Perú.

Desde hace 5 años se dedica a la siembra de papa, arveja y maíz, aunque él no pensaba dedicarse a la agricultura, pues deseaba estudiar una carrera profesional, la muerte de su madre lo hizo volcar sus esfuerzos a la siembra de los terrenos de sus padres.
Amilcar trabaja en su chacras acompañado de pequeño radio donde escucha sus queridos huaynos (música típica de la sierra); lo que más le gusta de su labor es que los productos que siembra gozan de una buena demanda en el mercado, aunque para adquirir tal calidad debe quedarse trabajando hasta altas horas de la noche.
A pesar de lo dura de su labor, considera que es rentable porque le brinda una adecuada calidad de vida a su padre y está ahorrando para comprar más terrenos, sembrar en mayor cantidad y construir una casa donde pueda formar su propia familia.                   

Este es el segundo préstamo que tiene con MFP y está seguro que pagará puntualmente sus cuotas como durante su primer crédito. A su vez, está feliz de trabajar con las personas de su banco comunal porque está integrando por sus amigos que son personas bastante responsables. Con el dinero que ahora solicita comprará varios sacos de fertilizantes y tres botellas de insecticidas para abonar y curar, respectivamente, sus sembríos de papa.
texts.en:
Amilcar is a humble and hardworking young man of 25. He is single and devotes himself to the care of his 77 year old father. They both live in their own house located in a cool zone in the mountains of Peru.

For five years Amilcar has worked at planting potatoes, peas, and corn, though he hadn’t planned on dedicating himself to agriculture since he wanted to study for a professional career. The death of his mother made him turn his efforts to the cultivation of his father’s fields.
